import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../styles/Pay.css"; function Pay() { const reviews = [ "RGM Family is amazing! The support from dispatch and trainers is top-notch. — John D.", "I love the pay structure here. Performance-based pay really motivates me to do my best. — Sarah M.", "The home time is great! I get weekends with my family, which is rare in trucking. — Mike T.", "Employee-owned company! Feels good to be a part of a team that actually cares about drivers. — Laura K.", "Excellent equipment, always clean and reliable. Makes driving enjoyable. — David P." ]; const [current, setCurrent] = useState(0); // Auto-slide reviews every 5 seconds useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => { setCurrent((prev) => (prev + 1) % reviews.length); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(timer); }, [reviews.length]); const nextReview = () => setCurrent((prev) => (prev + 1) % reviews.length); const prevReview = () => setCurrent((prev) => (prev - 1 + reviews.length) % reviews.length); return (
{/* HERO PAY SECTION */}

Driver Pay at RGM Family

Maximize your earning potential with performance-based pay

{/* CONTENT */}

Maximize Your Earning Potential

At RGM Family, we reward drivers for performance, not just miles. Our pay structure ensures your hard work reflects directly in your paycheck. Focus on driving — we’ll take care of the rest.

Additional Pay Opportunities

  • Tarp Pay
  • Breakdown Pay
  • Referral Bonuses
  • Stop Pay
  • Detention Pay
  • Over-Dimensional Load Pay
  • Vacation Pay
  • Sign-On Bonuses
{/* DRIVER STATS SECTION */}

Our Driver Statistics

Driver Satisfaction

100%

Average Pay Increase

95%

Retention Rate

90%
{/* CTA BOX */}

Drive It Like You Own It.

Apply Now
{/* TEXT REVIEWS SLIDESHOW */}

RGM Family Driver Reviews

{reviews[current]}

Reviews source:{" "} CarrierSource

); } export default Pay;
